author: Phil Vickery
method: Place the cream cheese, orange zest, one tablespoon of the honey and the icing sugar into a bowl and mix together well. Place three blinis onto a plate and place some of the cream cheese mixture on top. Place a blini on top and spread a second layer of cream cheese mixture over the top. Finish each stack with a third blini on top.  To serve, place an orange segment on top of each blini stack and drizzle with the remaining honey.
ingredients: 9 ready-made blinis,  100g/3Â½oz cream cheese,  1 orange, zest only,  2 tbsp honey ,  2 tbsp icing sugar ,  1 orange, peeled and segmented
